nodes.text: Lady Carisica Vanq was a wealthy Devaronian female noble who lived in an estate in Danteel City on the planet of Danteel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. She owned a collection of rare artifacts, among which was a valuable Tchine sculpture. She also became a business rival of the financier and casino owner Veilred Jydor. During the Galactic Civil War, Vanq was murdered by the Human Rovi a single blaster bolt to her upper torso. Rovi's employer, the business manager Darim Chumu, hoped to frame Jydor for her death and Rovi left behind a forged note purportedly written by Vanq, accusing Jydor of being her killer.
